show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today’s program we will be speaking with Michael Levitin, the webmaster for http://occupiedmedia.us- How the Occupied… Movement Uses the Internet to build the message, and later in the program we will hear from Genocide expert Angel Ryono regarding the Cambodian Genocide and the many similarities to Iraq and Afghanistan.
We’ll also hear from Steve Zeltzer of Work Week Radio with the local labor calendar.
